plans.title: Choose the Ideal Plan
plans.subtitle: Start small and scale as needed:

1.q: Can the AI answer any question?
1.a: The AI is specifically trained for your business and answers the most frequent questions. For complex cases, it automatically transfers to a human agent.

2.a: Basic implementation takes 3 to 7 business days. This includes AI training with your information and WhatsApp Business integration.

3.a: No! We handle all the technical work. You just need to provide your business information and approve the AI responses.

4.a: Yes, our plans are monthly and you can cancel whenever you want. Plus, we offer a 7-day unconditional guarantee.

5.q: Does the AI completely replace my team?
5.a: The AI is designed to complement your team, not replace it. It handles repetitive tasks, freeing your team for cases that truly need human attention.
